timeline.bodyText: Is it better to use a warning here?
timeline.author: chenjunjiedada

replies.bodyText:
I usually use assert to ensure something that if not happens then it is a coding issue. Here, this private constructor is invoked only at one place where the map is not empty. It is just that I've coded this line first and wanted to not forget about the check :)
(assert is good for such checks because they do not impact performance in production.)
replies.author: gszadovszky

replies.bodyText: I see, thanks for the explanation.
replies.author: chenjunjiedada

timeline.author: shangxinli

replies.bodyText: I usually don't like long class names if it is not required and here it is a private class. But if you have a strong opinion to change the name I'm happy to do so. :)
replies.author: gszadovszky

replies.bodyText: I usually like the name to be more specific than being short. But I don't have a strong opinion as this is a pretty personal preference.
replies.author: shangxinli
